subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
E-Mail
Threats and Threatening Messages
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A second person was sentenced for sending a threatening email to Travis Tygart, the chief executive of the United States Anti-Doping Agency, over its sanctions against Lance Armstrong.
snippet: A second person was sentenced for sending a threatening email to Travis Tygart, the chief executive of the United States Anti-Doping Agency, over its sanctions against Lance Armstrong.
